name: Foolzbrave's Birthday Extravaganza
description:
It's Foolzbrave's birthday, and he has to invite his friends to his party!

Find Character Addresses and enter them in-game to send a letter to a friend, then play as the friend and reach Foolzbrave's house!

NOTE:

Character Addresses are found through HeHe169's YouTube channel. After the first 30 days the game is out, all codes will become available in-game. Character Addresses must be entered in a specific order, shown by the virtual book within the game.

This game is pretty short, each character having 3 bite-sized auto running levels. 

CREDITS:

Background & Stage Layouts for characters 1, 2, and 5 are all from OvenBreak 2011

The music for characters 1-2 is a remix of a song within OvenBreak 2011

The gummy collectibles, rocket ship image and rocket ship flying sound are from OvenBreak 2009

Various sounds from OvenBreak 2009-2011 are used

Characters within the game are all by me, such as Foolzbrave and the Sock Pair.

Comments are turned off to prevent code sharing, they will be reopened once the game turns 30 days old.
